availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen P. Hogg (Hazard and Owsley Co storekeeper)

body.p: Perry County and Owsley County, Kentucky storekeeper. Whitesburg, Kentucky native. Son of Hiram Hogg and Vina Polly Hogg. Married to Sally A. Hogg. Storekeeper in Hazard in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, Hazard, District 1, p. 68.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Owsley County, KY, June and August 1865, p. 155, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Booneville, p. 2. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), 1917, Breathitt County, file no. 26854.
